content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

Here's a function named `extract_julia_code` in Julia that extracts all the code blocks from a given markdown document, removes code fences, and joins them together with a newline:

```julia
using Markdown

function extract_julia_code(md::AbstractString)
    doc :: MDDocument = parse(MD, md)
    code_blocks :: Vector{Node} = filter(x -> isa(x, CodeBlock), doc.content)
    all_code :: String = ""

    for block in code_blocks
        if length(block.content) > 1 # handle multiple lines code blocks
            all_code *= string(join(block.content, "\n")) * "\n"
        else # handle single line code blocks
            all_code *= block.content[1].value * "\n"
        end
    end

    all_code
end
```
